H0.text: In medieval England what kind of weapon was a serpentine. Longbow

H1.text: In medieval England what kind of weapon was a serpentine. Mace

H2.text: In medieval England what kind of weapon was a serpentine. Crossbow

H3.text: In medieval England what kind of weapon was a serpentine. Small cannon

A4.text: Mace (bludgeon), a weapon with a heavy head on a solid shaft used to bludgeon opponents
